profileAlternative.name: Paul Garner
profileAlternative.headline: Freelance Python Developer at Depop
profileAlternative.summary:
I am a highly skilled Python developer, experience with 'big data' (working for Google) and cloud platforms such as EC2 and App Engine. Experience with NoSQL data stores, Redis, RabbitMQ, caching and performance strategies for web applications. Django expert.

I am a cheerful, helpful, ‘can-do’ person with an inquiring mind – I enjoy finding solutions to difficult and unusual problems, writing good, clean, re-usable code and learning new skills.

Specialties: Python, Django, Javascript, SQL, NoSQL etc etc

aboutAlternative.text:

positions.title: Freelance Python Developer
positions.description: Python development using: Django, PostgreSQL, ElasticSearch, TensorFlow, Redis, gevent, Mongodb, Django REST Framework

positions.title: Freelance Python Developer
positions.companyName: project work for various digital agencies
positions.description: Python dev, specialising in web backend, with excellent Javascript, jQuery, SQL, NoSQL, Git, Apache etc

positions.title: Freelance Python Developer
positions.description: Python web app using: Flask, MongoDB, multiprocessing, SVG

positions.title: Python Developer
positions.description: Django and other Python back-end development, EC2, Redis, Cassandra db (NoSQL),Chef (...therefore a bit of Ruby) building a real-time stats-logging pipeline

given.text: Paul is an excellent senior developer with a grasp of the entire stack for modern web development, front and back. He has great attention to detail and produces well tested and maintainable code that meets or exceeds client expectation. It was a great pleasure working with him at U-Dox.

Paul is a very highly skilled senior web developer who has a depth and breadth of knowledge across most of the popular open source development technologies around. He requires zero hand holding, quickly grasps the most thinly defined requirements and delivers intelligently thought out solutions, quickly and without fuss. Paul is a very straight talking and reliable character with a dry wit, who can keep his cool under pressure, and is a real asset to my team.
…
See more

received.text: James is a true alpha geek, which I mean in the nicest possible way, as the highest compliment one developer can pay another. His coding interests are ever-broadening and, as a result, I have personally seen him hack up solutions to problems I would have thought impossible or highly infeasible. It was a pleasure to work with James and I know he's a, literally, indispensable asset to U-Dox, as he would be to any company.
